thread.title: Priyanka Chopra as Victoria Leeds looks sensationally HOT on the new Baywatch poster
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra as Victoria Leeds looks sensationally HOT on the new Baywatch poster

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Priyanka Chopra as Victoria Leeds looks sensationally HOT on the new Baywatch poster
text:
Priyanka Chopra as Victoria Leeds looks sensationally HOT on the new Baywatch poster Presenting to you Priyanka Chopra as Victoria Leeds from Baywatch.. By Snehal Rajani | Published: February 23, 2017 2:40 am Priyanka Chopra shoots for Jimmy Kimmel Live after People's Choice Awards Priyanka Chopra just shared a new poster introducing her character Victoria Leeds from her film Baywatch and we are absolutely in awe of her. How can someone manage to look so darn hot? Priyanka looks sexy in the hot red dress in the newly released poster of Baywatch. Last month she shared her first look poster from the film which had Summer Is Coming written on it. Talking about this new poster, PeeCee looks drop- dead gorgeous in the hot red dress. Don’t you agree? She captioned the pic on social media as: “Being bad can be so good.. presenting #VictoriaLeeds #Baywatch #may26”. (ALSO READ: Priyanka Chopra’s Baywatch just got a Mount Rushmore touch to it on President’s Day ) A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 22, 2017 at 10:51am PST 

If you go to see her social media accounts, Priyanka has begun the promotions of her first Hollywood movie Baywatch long ago. She seems to be really confident about her debut and why not? After all she is already a renowned star in the West. She’s created a niche for herself in the Hollywood film industry and she’s done it all by herself. She is a global star today and it always feels proud to see her on an international platform. Baywatch looks like one helluva movie with stars like Zac Effron and Dwayne Johnson in it and the film opens in theatres on May 26, 2017. Along With Zac, Dwayne and Priyanka the action-comedy stars Alexandra Daddario, Kelly Rohrbach, Jon Bass, Ilfenesh Hadera, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II in key roles. Also iconic stars from Baywatch TV series, David Hasselhoff and Pamela Anderson, make a cameo appearance in the movie. Now, we have to wait for Summer to see if the Seth Gordon film is worth all the hype. Stay tuned to more updates right her on BollywoodLife. Published: February 23, 2017 2:40 am Topics:
